showScoreExcerpt:
"A hilarious and at times touching musical farce...Ineptitude, inflated egos and teenage angst will likely never be this much fun...The choreography by director Casey Nicholaw is amazingâ€”perhaps too amazing: Some of the kids dancing at the prom look like they were raised in a boot camp run by Michael Kidd and Bob Fosse...But you best just go with it, lest you miss some of the funniest dialogue around...An unashamed comedy with some well-earned, genuinely touching moments."
